rules_text:
Flying
[i]Topple[/i] – {T}: Remove a counter from a creature or artifact you control: This Vehicle deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes:
2.1.0: Swapped out Machina Saboteurs for Junks. Red felt like it needed another vehicle that did nonvehicle things, as well as Prog Ares being legendary was hurting it’s utility, so this fills in the legendary slot.
2.2.0: Took the place of Prospectors Amdusias since that card got a more flavorful ability.
2.2.1: Moved up to five mana as stuff got shifted. Became the topple cannon. I liked the topple crew but this definitely also still does stuff but now has more distinct modes.
